mapper.select: select * from mvc_board order by bgroup desc, bstep asc
mapper.insert: insert into mvc_board (bid, bname, btitle, bcontent, bhit, bgroup, bstep, bindent) values (mvc_board_seq.nextval, #{bname}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, 0, mvc_board_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update mvc_board set bname=#{bname}, btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent} where bid =#{bid}
